content:
Welcome to your new space!
Spaces help your team structure, organize, and share work, so every team member has visibility into institutional knowledge and access to the information they need to do their best work.

# Get started with the basics

Start editing this page:

11
incomplete
Click the pencil icon ‚úèÔ∏è or `e` on your keyboard to edit and start typing. You can edit anywhere.

13
incomplete
Hit `/` to see all the types of content you can add to your page. Try `/image` or `/table`

14
incomplete
Use the toolbar at the top to play around with *font*, colors, formatting, and more

15
incomplete
Click `close` to save your draft or `publish` when your page is ready to be shared

#### ü™Ñ Need some inspiration?

metadata.title: Modivo Home

content:
to save your draft or `publish` when your page is ready to be shared

#### ü™Ñ Need some inspiration?

- Check out our Confluence best practices guide.
- Get a quick intro into what spaces are and how to best use them at Set up your site and spaces.
- Check out our guide for ideas on how to set up your space overview.
- If starting from a blank space is daunting, try using one of the space templates instead.

metadata.title: Modivo Home

content: Consulting managers can use this page for any purpose they wish, like adding meeting notes, business discussions or any template (s)he likes.

metadata.title: Modivo - 0. Project Management (PM's workplace)

content:
Creating customer-specific know-how ensures all critical information and unique aspects of the project requirements.

## Client Summary

noteCompany Name: XYZ CropSector:Technology

Brands:~150

Revenue: $150 billion (FY 2024)

Product Count: ~ 98K SKUs

Key Products:

1. Smartphones
2. Laptops
3. Cloud Services

Headquarters:Silicon Valley, California, USA

Global Reach:Operations in over 5 countries, with ~ 850 stores

Project Scope:

- Regions In Scope: PL(Poland), CZ(Czechia), SK(Slovakia), RO(Romania), HU(Hungary)
- Store Scope: Brand Type: Retail,
- Out-of-Store Scope: E-commerce

Solutions:Transfer, Replenishment

content:
Understanding the data transfer process during a handover is crucial because this ensures that the transition is smooth and secure, and maintains the integrity and continuity of operations. Here is a [1.1 Data Transfer Process] from an existing client.

## Flow

- The customer sends daily data to invent-xxx-input/daily_data/ in Microsoft Azure Storage every night at 2.30 AM.
- ‚Ä¶

## Daily File Instructions

Fill in the table below for files transferred using the daily data process.

| File Name | Datastore Folder | Critical |
| --- | --- | --- |
| eg. transactional_sales.csv | operation/transactional_salesoperation/sales | Yes |
| eg. supplier.csv | master-data/suppliers | No |
|  |  |  |

> Info: The critical column contains information on whether we can continue from the previous day if the customer does not send the file.

## Manual File Instructions

Fill in the table below for files not transferred using the daily data process.

content:
l File Instructions

Fill in the table below for files not transferred using the daily data process.

| File Name | Datastore Folder | Critical | Notes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| eg. supersede_item_family | invent-ebebek2-filemanager-ui/supersede_relations/ | No | We receive this file with UPLOAD MANAGEMENT via interfaces. |
|  |  |  |  |

## Special Cases

noteClient Specific Terminologies:

- e.g. You can enter instances like Style Color = Option, Site = Store, etc.

Special Days:

- e.g. Christmas period should be ignored from ignore table to avoid forecast fluctuation.

Special Rules:

- e.g. Pairs are eliminated from run scopes if not in the initial allocation scope. (Except stock consolidation runs)

- e.g. You can enter instances like Style Color = Option, Site = Store, etc.

Special Days:

- e.g. Christmas period should be ignored from ignore table to avoid forecast fluctuation.

Special Rules:

- e.g. Pairs are eliminated from run scopes if not in the initial allocation scope. (Except stock consolidation runs)

## Pager Duty

> Info: For PagerDuty setup, please contact the CX-IT Rocks team.

PagerDuty is an incident management and notification tool that integrates well with Airflow to alert teams in case of task or job failures. Teams can use PagerDuty to receive alerts when a task or Dag fails, helping ensure a timely response to critical issues.

## SLA and Timeout

SLA and Timeout are mechanisms to manage task and workflow performance, ensuring that tasks or DAGs complete within expected timeframes. They help identify tasks that are running longer than expected, allowing for invention, alerting, or fail-safe measures.

Maintenance guidelines are critical to ensuring the longevity, reliability,  and safety of systems and processes. Here are [07. Maintenance Guideline] and [07. Maintenance Guideline] from an existing client.

> Action items in Maintenance Guideline are expected to managed by the Delivery Manager (read the information for each part below, and contact related teams if necessary). Once the CX-IT support started (support handed-over to CX-IT Team), CX-IT Team will follow this guideline.

## Azure Maintenance

> Contact Shield team, if you haven‚Äôt handed-over support to CX-IT Team yet

15
15
complete
Maintenance dag runs every week.

## Database Maintenance

> Contact Database Admin team (Burak Obuz), if you haven‚Äôt handed-over support to CX-IT Team yet

Regularly perform database maintenance tasks such as indexing, vacuuming, and backup rotations. Monitoring query performance and optimizing where necessary

Quality Control:The answer should be given by UI screen reports, the way of answering should be part of the UI documentation on Cheetah.

metadata.title: Modivo - 6. Testing and Quality Assurance

content:
given by UI screen reports, the way of answering should be part of the UI documentation on Cheetah.

1. Target is high/low for these Store-SKU combinations, why?
2. Why is there no order for store.x-sku.y?
3. What was my revenue, sales, lost sales, and in-stock status last week?
4. What were my in-stock levels yesterday?
5. Review Store-SKU target & order quantity for:Number of in-stock days < 3 daysTarget WOS (Weeks of Supply) < 10 daysTarget WOS > 60 days & Target > 4
6. Show test scenarios for these (Change ‚Üí Run ‚Üí Result review ‚Üí Go live)How will the target & orders change if we add 5 additional DOS?How will the target & orders change if we increase/decrease service level by 3%?Apply forecast multiplier.

Special Day Effect:Ensure that the special days are reviewed and verified before the handover. This includes confirming the accuracy of forecast data, sales comparisons, and any manual processes required. Documentation should be completed and approved prior to the handover to the client.

- Show the top 5 special days in a year.Run forecasts 2 months before that day in the upcoming year and summarize results by: forecast vs previous year sales. explain differencesIf there is any manual review or process needed for these times, show the documentation, and get approval
- Seasonality curve for each sub-category, compared with the previous year‚Äôs sales
- Confirm the path for detailed run results

metadata.title: Modivo - 6. Testing and Quality Assurance

content:
ch sub-category, compared with the previous year‚Äôs sales
- Confirm the path for detailed run results

35
35
incomplete
Seasonality Effect:Monitor and manage seasonal variations to ensure accurate forecasting and performance analysis. This includes tracking seasonality trends for each category, comparing them with previous years‚Äô sales, and adjusting forecasts as necessary. Ensure that any seasonal adjustments are documented and approved before implementation.

- Identify a specific season change period in the year (for example, the start or end of a summer season).Run forecasts 2 months before that day in the upcoming year and summarize results by: forecast vs previous year sales. explain differencesIf there is any manual review or process needed for these times, show the documentation, and get approval
- Seasonality curve for each sub-category, compared with the previous year‚Äôs sales
- Confirm the path for detailed run results
